resources.string: Login With Your Google Account and get using our Scompass App.
All in one Trip Planner with Social Experience

Scompass is a tool for those who didn\'t know well about Tourist places. So When you explore our app, you can find famous beaches, hotels, embassys, museums and all basic informations that a person wants to know before visiting a place.
logo of scompass in the splash screen
Login using your email or just use your google account to login.
Login With Your Google Account and get using our Scompass App.
Explore new tours to your destination.
In this package, we cover the trip from Chennai to Yelagiri
Stay Tunned for our Moments Social Experience.
Tourists should pack reusable water bottles, cutlery, and bags to reduce single-use plastic waste.

From Chennai:

 Day 1:
 • Depart from Chennai early in the morning.
 • Travel to Kolli Hills by car or bus (approximately 6-7 hours).
 • Check-in at your chosen campsite or set up your own camp.
 • Enjoy a bonfire and stargazing in the evening.

 Day 2:
 • Explore the natural beauty of Kolli Hills, including a trek to Agaya Gangai Waterfalls.
 • Visit the Arapaleeswarar Temple.
 • Return to your campsite for another night of camping and relaxation.

 Day 3:
 • Discover more scenic spots like Siddhar Caves and the Boat House.
 • Enjoy your last night in Kolli Hills.

 Day 4:
 • Check out from your campsite.
 • Begin your journey back to Chennai, cherishing beautiful memories.

 From Bangalore:

 Day 1:
 • Leave Bangalore early in the morning.
 • Travel to Kolli Hills by car or bus (approximately 7-8 hours).
 • Check-in at your chosen campsite or set up your own camp.
 • Enjoy a bonfire and stargazing at night.

 Day 2:
 • Explore the natural beauty of Kolli Hills, including a trek to Agaya Gangai Waterfalls.
 • Visit the Arapaleeswarar Temple.
 • Return to your campsite for another night of camping and relaxation.

 Day 3:
 • Explore more scenic spots like Siddhar Caves and the Boat House.
 • Enjoy your last night in Kolli Hills.

 Day 4:
 • Check out from your campsite.
 • Begin your journey back to Bangalore, carrying wonderful memories with you.

From Chennai:

 Day 1:
 - Start your journey early in the morning from Chennai.
 - Drive to Kodaikanal (approximately 8-9 hours).
 - Check into your camping site in Kodaikanal.
 - Set up your camp and enjoy a bonfire in the evening.

 Day 2:
 - Wake up early to catch the sunrise at Coaker's Walk.
 - After breakfast, head for a trek to Dolphin's Nose.
 - Return to the campsite for a relaxing afternoon.
 - Enjoy a barbecue dinner at the campsite.

 Day 3:
 - Visit the Kodaikanal Lake for boating.
 - Explore the local markets and buy some souvenirs.
 - In the evening, go stargazing at the campsite.

 Day 4:
 - Check out from the campsite.
 - Visit the Pillar Rocks and Guna Caves.
 - Start your journey back to Chennai.

 From Bangalore:

 Day 1:
 - Depart from Bangalore early in the morning.
 - Drive to Kodaikanal (approximately 7-8 hours).
 - Check in at your camping site and set up your camp.
 - Enjoy a campfire and dinner at night.

 Day 2:
 - Wake up early and head to Coaker's Walk for sunrise.
 - Have breakfast at the campsite.
 - Go for a trek to Green Valley Viewpoint.
 - Return to the campsite for relaxation and evening activities.

 Day 3:
 - Visit Kodaikanal Lake for boating.
 - Explore local attractions like Bryant Park and Shenbaganur Museum.
 - Enjoy a bonfire and barbecue dinner.

 Day 4:
 - Check out from the campsite.
 - Visit the Pillar Rocks and Guna Caves.
 - Start your journey back to Bangalore.

 Remember to check weather conditions and make camping reservations in advance. Also, ensure you have the necessary camping gear and permits if required. Adjust the itinerary as needed based on your interests and the time available.
